data.text: Behind-the-scenes photo: Ban Ki-moon & Aung San Suu Kyi at UNHQ on Friday: http://t.co/LXU9T5Eu. More on her visit: http://t.co/zqEf5Iz8

Starts today in NYC: 67th session of the General Assembly.  Background info here: http://t.co/u44aaQgI & follow #UNGA for updates.
